title: Cold-poached Trout With Watercress Mayo
summary: Cold-poached Trout With Watercress Mayo might be just the main course you are searching for. Watching your figure? This dairy free and pescatarian recipe has 685 calories, 33g of protein, and 29g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 2 and costs $3.47 per serving. Head to the store and pick up watercress, trout, mayonnaise, and a few other things to make it today. 1 person found this recipe to be flavorful and satisfying. It is brought to you by BBC Good Food. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 20 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 75%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Cold Poached Trout, Poached Red Trout On Watercress With Blood Orange Dressing, and Egg mayo & watercress rolls.
